title: mekathalo
author: mekathalo
content: i see one page for 1$ get list of coinhttp://infod.ddns.net/what you think for this

comments.author: Taskford
comments.body: Quote from: mekathalo on June 28, 2022, 09:15:05 PMi see one page for 1$ get list of coinhttp://infod.ddns.net/what you think for thisBest if you clear what you want to ask since if you ask because you want to advertise something on that site since you think they are much cheaper to any other site offer the same service well this will not be good if they didn't got much traffic on their site itself. Its like you are just wasting your money because for sure what you promote their will most like not be seen by your target audiences.

Its like you are just wasting your money because for sure what you promote their will most like not be seen by your target audiences.obviously a ClickBait mate , because he does not even checking this thread after account creation and posting this link.I suggest every member here to not clicking that link and forget about this thread unless OP will Open back and completely answer what he tend to do with that site.but i can feel that he is promoting that and he is also part of the team behind that.

comments.author: Amicable55
comments.body: Everyone want to earn money. Earning money by doing some work like as Bounty project. But earning 1$ through just clicking is not making any sense. You must come with solid idea and post here and promote yourself. This post promoting others on behalf of you.

comments.author: lixer
comments.body: Quote from: Amicable55 on August 01, 2022, 07:50:48 AMEveryone want to earn money. Earning money by doing some work like as Bounty project. But earning 1$ through just clicking is not making any sense. You must come with solid idea and post here and promote yourself. This post promoting others on behalf of you.And why it doesn't make any sense? There are actually earning opportunities like that. Its called paid to click but usually the rate for those type of jobs are not 1 dollar per a few click but can be lower than that however I don't think this is the one the op is offering here but it must be a paid or premium groups as what his title says.Maybe after you pay 1 dollar as an entrance fee, you can access a group where you can find recommendations if what coin can pump high. And what is that solid idea you are looking about? This is already his idea and there's nothing wrong if he is promoting the project of someone else because maybe he is being paid to do it.

comments.author: UmerIdrees
comments.body: Quote from: Amicable55 on August 01, 2022, 07:50:48 AMEveryone want to earn money. Earning money by doing some work like as Bounty project. But earning 1$ through just clicking is not making any sense. You must come with solid idea and post here and promote yourself. This post promoting others on behalf of you.I don't think this was ad of earning 1$ by clicking, I think he wanted us to join a group for 1$ where he or someone is sharing the list of coins. Whatever is the case, it is not useful and also when I checked the site, it is not loading. You can understand what would be the quality of the group who is making for a dollar. We should better stop searching the internet for such scam programs and try to earn online through genuine online works.
